    • openEditCustomerMenu

      public void openEditCustomerMenu() throws IOException
      Gets the data from the selected customer and assigns it to a new object "selectedCustomer" of the customerData class. If selectedCustomer is null (no customer was selected) then it will throw an alert to the user to let them know. It sends the selectedCustomer data over to the new scenes' controller class where the data is plug into the method "setData" which fills in the boxes on that screen with selectedCustomer's data.
      Throws:
      IOException - catches the exceptions thrown by the scene controller

    • openAddAppointmentMenu

      public void openAddAppointmentMenu() throws IOException

If selectedCustomer is null (no customer was selected) then it will throw an alert to the user to let them know. It sends the selectedCustomer data over to the new scenes' controller class where the data is plug into the method "setData" which fills in the boxes on that screen with selectedCustomer's data.
      Throws:
      IOException - catches the exceptions thrown by the scene controller

    • openEditAppointmentMenu

      public void openEditAppointmentMenu() throws IOException

If selectedCustomer is null (no customer was selected) then it will throw an alert to the user to let them know. It sends the selectedAppointment data over to the new scenes' controller class where the data is plug into the method "setData" which fills in the boxes on that screen with selectedAppointments' data.
      Throws:
      IOException - catches the exceptions thrown by the scene controller

    • deleteAppointment

      public void deleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Gets the data from the selected appointment and assigns it to a new object "selectedAppointment" of the appointmentData class. If selectedAppointment is null (no customer was selected) then it will throw an alert to the user to let them know. An alert confirms with the user that they want to delete the selected appointment before deletion initiates. selectedAppointments' data is sent to the method "appointmentDeleteSQL" in appointmentDataSQl where it is removed from the database. The event then re-opens the overviewMenu to update the overviewMenu and reflects the deletion.
      Parameters:
      event - re-opens overviewMenu

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Gets the data from the selected customer and assigns it to a new object "selectedCustomer" of the customerData class. If selectedCustomer is null (no customer was selected) then it will throw an alert to the user to let them know. An alert confirms with the user that they want to delete the selected customer before deletion initiates. The database restricts us to deleting appointments associated with the customer before we can delete the customer so first the customer ID is sent to "customerAppointmentDeleteSQL" where it will delete any appointments with the customer ID attached to it. selectedCustomers' data is sent to the method "customerDeleteSQL" in customerDataSQl where it is removed from the database. The event then re-opens the overviewMenu to update the overviewMenu and reflects the deletion.
      Parameters:
      event - re-opens overviewMenu

    • searchAppointments

      public void searchAppointments()
      This search looks for any matching appointment ID, title, type, or description and updates the appointment list with the found appointments with matching terms. If the search box is blank then it will just update the appointment list with all the appointments in the database.

    • openLoginMenu

      public void openLoginMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Allows the user to log out and return to the loginMenu
      Parameters:
      event - opens loginMenu

    • viewAllRadio

      public void viewAllRadio()
      Sets all the data in the appointment table to be all appointments in the database Sets the miscDropDown to false so that it can't be clicked on

    • viewMonthRadio

      public void viewMonthRadio()
      Sets the value in the miscDropDown to "" to reset month selected when switched back to this option Sets the miscDropDown to visible, so you can view all appointments in each month fills the miscDropDown with required data to pick months

    • viewWeekRadio

      public void viewWeekRadio()
      Sets the miscDropDown to false so that it can't be clicked on Calls the filterByWeek method to update the table

    • filterByMonth

      public void filterByMonth()

    • filterByWeek

      public void filterByWeek()
